name: Thrive (bassguitarbill)
description:
You have found a young plant in the post-apocalypse, where such things are very rare! Find plant food for it so it can grow, but don’t let it run out of water!  Controls are arrow keys to move and Enter to interact.

This was my first game made with Godot, so I definitely spent a lot of time learning and not so much time actually doing what I wanted to do. I might come back to this because I like the aesthetics so much, but I might not because the code is really a mess.

Godot / Aseprite / Bosca Ceoil / Audacity / SFXR
